Package game.environments

Class Environment

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground
game.environments.Environment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Barrack, Cage, FlareOfInferno, Graveyard, GustOfWind, PuddleOfWater, TrevorOfEarth
public abstract class Environment
extends Ground
Abstract class representing a game environment, which is a type of Ground object.
See Also:
Ground

  • Constructor Details

    • Environment

      public Environment​(char displayChar)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      displayChar - character to display for this type of terrain

  • Method Details

    • spawn

      public abstract Enemy spawn​(Location location, GameMap map)
      Abstract method that spawns an enemy at the given location in the given game map.
      Parameters:
      location - the location where the enemy should spawn
      map - the game map in which the enemy is spawned
      Returns:
      an Enemy object representing the enemy that was spawned

    • detEast

      public java.lang.Boolean detEast​(Location location, GameMap map)
      Determines if a location is east the map.
      Parameters:
      location - the location to be checked
      map - the game map containing the location
      Returns:
      true if the location is east of the middle of the map, false if it is the west side

    • detNorth

      public java.lang.Boolean detNorth​(Location location, GameMap map)
      Determines if a location is north the map.
      Parameters:
      location - the location to be checked
      map - the game map containing the location
      Returns:
      true if the location is north of the middle of the map, false if it is the south side

    • tick

      public void tick​(Location location)
      Overrides the tick method in Ground. Spawns an enemy at the location if there is no actor at the location.
      Overrides:
      tick in class Ground
      Parameters:
      location - the location to be ticked
